Plot: Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.
Title: The Expendables 3
Writer: Sylvester Stallone (screenplay), Creighton Rothenberger (screenplay), Katrin Benedikt (screenplay), Sylvester Stallone (story), Dave Callaham (characters)
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Harrison Ford, Arnold Schwarzenegger
tomatoConsensus: Like its predecessors, Expendables 3 offers a modicum of all-star thrills for old-school action thriller aficionados -- but given all the talent assembled, it should have been a lot more fun.
